cast.overview: A woman falls victim to a dominant mafia boss, who imprisons her and gives her one year to fall in love with him.
cast.title: 365 Days

details.biography:
Michele Morrone (Italian pronunciation: [miˈkɛːlemorˈroːne]; born 3 October 1990) is an Italian actor, model, singer, and fashion designer. He gained international recognition after portraying the role of Massimo Torricelli in the 2020 erotic thriller 365 Days and its sequels, 365 Days: This Day and The Next 365 Days in 2022.

Description above from the Wikipedia Michele Morrone, article licensed under CC-BY-SA, full list of contributors on Wikipedia.
details.name: Michele Morrone
